DOC.brief_summary: This study examine safety effectiveness dietary intervention pregnant woman . Women obese invited participate . The control arm receive routine prenatal care one in-person nutritional dietary counseling session promote healthy eating pregnancy . The intervention arm receive intensive dietary program include in-person counseling group support session . The goal intervention weight maintenance ( weight 2 week delivery within 3 % baseline weight ) avoidance postpartum weight retention
DOC.criteria: BMI 30 Less 20 week gestation member Kaiser Permanente Northwest ( NW ) receive prenatal care Kaiser Permanente NW speak English current treatment cancer bariatric surgery current renal disease multiple birth anticipate hyperemesis require hospitalization diabetes ( type 1 2 )
